name: 2022 6th International Conference on Sustainable Tourism Management
content: For papers submitted to ICSTM 2022, we offer the publications as following: Submissions will be reviewed by the ICSTM conference committees, and accepted papers will be published into the ICAEB 2022 post-proceedings as a workshop by Springer Proceedings in Business and Economics (Electronic ISSN: 2198-7254; Print ISSN: 2198-7246) book series, which will be indexed by Scopus, Google Scholar, etc. Some selected papers can be recommended to Journal of Advanced Management Science for possible publication after being extended, which will be indexed by Ulrich's Periodicals Directory, Google Scholar, Crossref, Electronic Journals Digital Library, etc.
